description: K. Ramesh alias Vishvalingam Sasi Kumar Vs. Hon. Attorney General - Grave and sudden provocation-subjective and objective elements of the plea- failure on the part of the high court judge to direct on the plea before  Hon. A.H.M.D. Nawaz, J
